Package student

Class International

  • java.lang.Object
    • student.Student
      • student.NonResident
        • student.International
  • public class International
extends NonResident
    This class contains information about international students and if they are study abroad or not. Contains updated tuition amount.
    Author:
    Stephen Juan, David Halim

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean studyAbroad  

      • Fields inherited from class student.NonResident

        nonResidentCreditHour, nonResidentTuition

      • Fields inherited from class student.Student

        fulltimeThreshold, minFulltime, universityFee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      International​(Profile profile, int creditHours, boolean studyAbroad)
      This is a constructor for the international students that is the same as NonResident except it included whether or not the student is in the study abroad program or not.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float getTotalCost()
      This method gets the tuition for international students.
      void isValidCreditHours()
      This method overrides the isValidCreditHours from Student and includes extra restrictions for study abroad students.
      void setStudyAbroad()  
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns a string representation of the student in the format "name:major:credit hours:tuition due: last payment:payment date:non-resident:Internatiional".
      void tuitionDue()
      This method calculates the tuition due by subtracting the total cost of tuition minus the money the student has already paid.

    • Field Detail

      • studyAbroad

        private boolean studyAbroad

    • Constructor Detail

      • International

        public International​(Profile profile,
                     int creditHours,
                     boolean studyAbroad)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This is a constructor for the international students that is the same as NonResident except it included whether or not the student is in the study abroad program or not.
        Parameters:
        profile - - profile of the student (from Student)
        creditHours - - number of credits that the student is taking (from Student)
        studyAbroad - - if the student is in the study abroad program or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidCreditHours

        public void isValidCreditHours()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method overrides the isValidCreditHours from Student and includes extra restrictions for study abroad students. If they are study abroad, they are only allowed to take a maximum of 12 credits.
        Overrides:
        isValidCreditHours in class Student
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

      • setStudyAbroad

        public void setStudyAbroad()

      • getTotalCost

        public float getTotalCost()
        This method gets the tuition for international students.
        Overrides:
        getTotalCost in class NonResident
        Returns:
        the total cost of tuition for international students

      • tuitionDue

        public void tuitionDue()
        This method calculates the tuition due by subtracting the total cost of tuition minus the money the student has already paid.
        Overrides:
        tuitionDue in class NonResident

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method returns a string representation of the student in the format "name:major:credit hours:tuition due: last payment:payment date:non-resident:Internatiional".
        Overrides:
        toString in class NonResident
        Returns:
        string representation of a student.
